intro: As part of an educational project - FIXPERTS, at the Holon Institute of Technology - HIT, in Israel. We designed the wrist guitar pick for Ariel, Who diagnosed with CP that effect his right side of the body and the fine motor skills in his right hand . Help him play the guitar as he like, fast or slow and up or down the strings! We designed 2 versions, one based on 3D printing only, the other for those who have access to orthoplast (a material used to make splints) You are welcome to download and prepare yourself!
intro_items: As part of an educational project - FIXPERTS, at the Holon Institute of Technology - HIT, in Israel.
We designed the wrist guitar pick for Ariel, Who diagnosed with CP that effect his right side of the body and the fine motor skills in his right hand .
Help him play the guitar as he like, fast or slow and up or down the strings!
We designed 2 versions, one based on 3D printing only, the other for those who have access to orthoplast (a material used to make splints)
You are welcome to download and prepare yourself!
materiaux:
Supplies
  • For version 1:
  • 22 mm wide polyester strip (25 cm long)
  • velcro strip (5 cm long)
  • For version 2:
  • 22 mm wide polyester strip (25 cm long)
  • velcro strip (5 cm long)
  • bias ribbon (50 cm long)
  • wax string (10 cm long)

etapes.html:
1. Step 1: Choose a Version

Étapes :

  1. version 1: 3D printing only (steps 2-3)
  2. version 2: combined 3D printing and orthoplast (steps 4-5)

2. Step 2: Printing Vr 1

Étapes :

  1. print all the files, no supports needed
3. Step 3: Assembly Vr 1

4. Step 4: Printing Vr 2

Étapes :

  1. print all the stl files, no supports needed

5. Step 5: Assembly Vr 2
